coxstream 0.0.0.9000
  • Reference

Simulated Stream Survival Data

Source: R/sim.R
sim.Rd

The dataset containing simulated survival data for 1000 patients arriving in 10 batches. Each patient may have multiple observations across batches, with the total number of observations 1500. Covariates of dimension \(5\) are drawn from a multivariate normal distribution with mean zero and covariance matrix \(\Sigma\), where \(\Sigma_{ij} = \rho^{|i-j|}\) (\(\rho = 0.3\)). The hazard function depends on covariates through \(\bfbeta = (1, \ldots, 1)^{\top}\), with a baseline hazard function \(\lambda_{0}(t) = t\). The maximum follow-up time is fixed at 3.

Format

A data frame with 1500 rows and 10 variables:

batch_id

The index of the batch, ranging from 1 to 10.

record_id

The index of the observation, ranging from 1 to 1500.

patient_id

The index of the patient, ranging from 1 to 1000.

time

The survival time.

status

The event status, 0=censored, 1=event.

X1

Covariate 1.

X2

Covariate 2.

X3

Covariate 3.

X4

Covariate 4.

X5

Covariate 5.

Developed by Ziyang Gong.

Site built with pkgdown 2.1.2.
